name: Vodafone Belgium SA
goal:
Vodafone is one of the world’s largest telecommunications companies and provides a range of services including voice, messaging, data and fixed communications. Vodafone has mobile operations in 26 countries, partners with mobile networks in 49 more, and fixed broadband operations in 17 markets. As of 31 December 2016, Vodafone had 470 million mobile customers and 14.3 million fixed broadband customers. For more information, please visit: www.vodafone.com.

The Vodafone Brussels office is in charge of following the policy and regulatory debate at EU level.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
- DSM Strategy
- Review of the European Electronic Communications Code
- Review AVMS Directive
- Reform of the EU’s Copyright rules including content
portability rules
- Digitisation of Industries/data economy package, IoT
- Cybersecurity including IoT trust label
- Privacy- eprivacy directive review
- Consumer regulation- digital content, tangible goods
